package.name: Gesturer
package.shortDescription: Gestures on iOS 13. It'll execute any command you set in settings.

descriptionlist.description:
Gestures on iOS 13. It'll execute any command you set in settings. This is a successor package to the previous StatusBarGesture tweak. Please note that this is a beta package.

Available gestures on:
- Status Bar
- LockScreen Clock
- Dock
